translations: v．轻蔑，鄙视：对某人或某事表示不屑一顾或不尊重。

sentences.sentence: Tell how, disdaining all earth can give.
sentences.translation: 告诉世人他是怎样蔑视尘？

sentences.sentence: Worrying about your sighs in your disdaining regrets.
sentences.translation: 担心你的叹息，还有你轻蔑的悔恨。

sentences.sentence: Our posh new neighbors seem to be disdaining to speak to us.
sentences.translation: 我们高级新邻居似乎不屑于和我们讲话。
